Top-3 Scripts:
su_1527402: youtube-dl --merge-output-format mp4 -f "bestvideo+bestaudio[ext=m4a]/best" --embed-thumbnail --add-metadata [url]

youtube-dl --merge-output-format mp4 --postprocessor-args "-strict experimental" -f "bestvideo+bestaudio/best" --embed-thumbnail --add-metadata [url]

Explanations about Options.--add-metadata: Write metadata to the video file
Explanations about Options.--merge-output-format:
If a merge is required (e.g. bestvideo+bestaudio), output to given container
 format. One of mkv, mp4, ogg, webm, flv. Ignored if no merge is required
Explanations about Options.--postprocessor-args: Give these arguments to the postprocessor
Explanations about Options.--embed-thumbnail: Embed thumbnail in the audio as cover art
